+heavy_description: The addition of bulletproof vest, hardened plating, and helmet. Or a riot shield.
a_comm_description: An advanced computing device worn on the thumb and forefinger, featuring a holographic touchscreen and multi-band transceiver suitable for networking devices and accessing cyberspace.
a_large_weapon_description: A weapon meant for two hands. A battle axe, katana, warhammer, or polearm. A hunting rifle. A shotgun. A bow or crossbow
a_medieval_weapon_description: A handheld weapon designed for brutal melee. A set of brass knucks. A Port-au-Prince Slugger baseball bat. A serrated sawblade.
a_pistol_description: A heavy pistol, semi-automatic, and loaded with a magazine containing enough ammunition for a quick murder or escape. Devastating at speaking distance and quick to reload.
a_quiet_weapon_description: A lightweight weapon which makes little noise during use or while carried. A small set of throwing knives or ninja stars. A blowgun and darts.
ammo_description: A bunch of extra ammunition. Extra sets of throwing knives, arrows, bullets, etc.
an_unusual_weapon_description: A curiosity or tool turned into a weapon. A coiled whip, a gardening shovel, a length of chain, a razoredged fan, a commercial bug sprayer, steeltoed boots.
ancient_blood_desc: Draw one additional box for level 1 harm (for a total of three) due to your ancient magical blood.

beast_of_burden_desc: You're not inconspicuous by default (even with a light loadout), but that's okay you can carry 2 additional load (more if you have saddlebags). Further, you are not overburdened until you bear 10 load.

centaur_senses_desc: You can always sense the presence of supernatural power nearby.

command_description: Command obedience with your force of personality; intimidate or threaten; lead an action with one of the crew's teams.
consort_description: Consort with connections from your heritage, background, friends, or rivals to gain access to resources, information, people, or places.
crew_ability_blood_brothers_description: When you fight alongside your cohorts in combat, they get +1d for teamwork rolls (setup and group actions). All of your cohorts get the Thugs type for free (if they're already thugs, add another type).
crew_ability_catastrophic_methods_descri: Aberrant supernatural beings and other horrors sometimes manifest in the physical world in support of your cult. This can be a great boon, but the priorities and values of such things are not those of mortals. You have been warned
crew_ability_cleaners_description: When you dispose of evidence to reduce heat, you get +1 result level to your roll. When you employ acid, you are specially prepared to be immune to its effects
crew_ability_collusion_description: Through subtle manipulation or hard-won experience, you have discovered how to get security agencies and/or institutions to agree with your manifesto. They do not help directly. How do they aid your cause?
crew_ability_crew_managers_description: During downtime, one of your cohorts may perform a downtime activity for the crew to acquire an asset, reduce heat, or work on a long-term project.
crew_ability_dangerous_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Fight, Stalk, or Wreck (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_deadly_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Stalk, Prowl, or Fight (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_devoted_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Assense, Attune, or Study (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_door_kickers_description: When you execute an assault plan, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_empowered_by_blood_descript: Each person sacrificed yields -3 edge cost for any spell or thread you perform.
crew_ability_extremists_description: Your manifesto inspires irrational fear and superstition, and others afford you added respect for your dedication. You may count up to three +3 faction statuses you hold as if they are marked fixers.
crew_ability_feared_description: Fear is as good as respect. You may count each wanted level as if they were fixers.
crew_ability_fleet_description: Your cohorts have their own vehicles. Your Transporter cohorts gain +1d when under your command.
crew_ability_for_the_cause_description: Each PC gains an additional Vice: Demonstration. When you indulge this vice and distribute effective propaganda, you don't overindulge if you clear excess edge. In addition, the solidarity of the crew will assist any one action roll you make—from now until you indulge this vice again.
crew_ability_friends_in_low_places_descr: You have the implicit support of the homeless and disenfranchised. Take -1  heat during downtime and +1d to gather information about the city's underworld or fringe.
crew_ability_hooked_description: Your team members use your product. Add the savage, unreliable, or wild flaw to your teams to give them +1 quality.
crew_ability_imbued_description: You get +1d to resistance rolls against supernatural threats. You get +1d to healing rolls when you have supernatural harm.
crew_ability_intruders_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Engineer, Interface, or Prowl (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_just_passing_through_descri: During downtime, take -1 heat. When your heat is 4 or less, you get +1d to deceive people when you pass yourselves off as ordinary citizens.
crew_ability_leverage_description: Your crew supplies contraband for other factions. Your success is good for them. Whenever you gain rep, gain +1 rep.
crew_ability_like_part_of_the_crew_descr: Create one of your vehicles as a cohort (use the vehicle edges and flaws, below). Its quality is equal to your Tier +1.A vehicle can use teamwork actions (using quality for rolls). A vehicle can't lead a group action, but may participate.
crew_ability_mass_appeal_description: Your movement has gained acceptance among a wider portion of the city. Add the principled, unreliable, or wild flaw to any or all of your teams to give them +1 scale (up to a max scale of 5).
crew_ability_mnemonics_description: From harsh experience or experimental implantation, all crew members' comms and implants are immune to being remotely controlled, but may choose to voluntarily transfer control to someone nearby.
crew_ability_moving_targets_description: When you go into conflict aboard a vehicle, you gain +1 effect for vehicle damage and speed. Your vehicle gains armor.
crew_ability_opportunists_description: You get +1d to gather information for an intrusion or robbery operation.
crew_ability_patron_description: When you advance your Tier, it costs half the nuyen it normally would. Who is your patron? Why do they help you?
crew_ability_poise_under_pressure_descri: When you're marked (-3 faction status), your crew does not suffer -1 hold and PCs still get two downtime activities, instead of just one.
crew_ability_predators_description: When you use a stealth or deception plan to commit murder, take +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_revolutionaries_description: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Command, Consort, or Influence (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_second_story_description: When you execute a clandestine infiltration, you get +1d to the engagement roll.
crew_ability_seen_some_drek_description: The crew has grown particularly resistant due to cruel experience. Each PC gets +1d to resistance rolls with an attribute of choice.
crew_ability_shared_telepathy_descriptio: You may use teamwork maneuvers with any cult member, regardless of the distance separating you. By marking 1 edge, your telepathic message is heard and understood by every cultist.
crew_ability_silenced_description: Due to hard-won experience or strange practices, your activities are hidden from the notice of agencies that typically track deaths. You don't take extra heat when killing is involved on a score.
crew_ability_slippery_description: When you roll entanglements, roll twice and keep the one you want. When you reduce heat on the crew, take +1d.
crew_ability_smooth_operators_descriptio: Each PC may add +1 action rating to Finesse, Influence, or Interface (up to a max rating of 3).
crew_ability_strange_ways_description: Each PC gains an additional Vice: Ceremonial Rites. When you indulge this vice and bring a pleasing offering, you don't overindulge if you clear excess edge. In addition, your ceremonyial buff will assist any one action roll you make — from now until you indulge this vice again.
crew_ability_sudden_description: When you execute a loud or chaotic murder, take 2 fewer heat than normal.
crew_ability_synchronized_description: When you perform a group action, you may count multiple 6s from different rolls as a critical success.
crew_ability_uncanny_preparation_descrip: Twice per session during a Desperate action, improve your effect or position. Describe a flashback that gives you the advantage now (setup action).
crew_ability_unseen_description: When you keep an operation quiet or make it look like an accident, you get half the rep value of the target (round up) instead of zero. When you end downtime with zero heat, take +1 rep.
crew_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another crew (can be taken more than once).
crew_ability_zealotry_description: Your cohorts have abandoned their reason inservice to the cult. They will undertake any service, no matter how dangerous or strange. They gain +1d quality against enemies of the tradition.

crew_couriers_xp_condition: Execute a successful delivery or acquire new clients or contraband sources.

crew_mercs_xp_condition: Execute a successful battle, extortion, sabotage, or smash & grab operation.
crew_radicals_xp_condition: Advance the agendas of your movement or embody its precepts in action.
crew_shadows_xp_condition: Execute a successful intrusion, espionage, robbery, or sabotage operation.

darkvision_desc: You can see in complete darkness as easily as if it were well-lit.
debt_desc: You owe a faction a free "milk run" (start a clock for "anger")
demolition_tools_description: Impact drill and power packs. A miniwelder and large fuel tank. Heavy-duty crowbar. A handheld pneumatic bolt cutter.
diverse_desc: Choose another special ability (counts as two)
dwarfdesc: Dwarves are roughly a meter and a half (just under five feet) tall. Despite their stature, dwarves have earned the respect of most of the other magical lineages for their technical prowess and never-say-die attitude.
earthsight_desc: You are immune to being blinded or surprised while in contact with the ground.
elfdesc: Elves are pointy-eared humanoids with alluring eyes and soft skin. They tend to be just as capable as humans in most ways, but have certain qualities that make them feel special.
endothermic_desc: When there is a question whether your body produces a heat signature, the answer is no.
engineer_description: Engineer devices and mechanisms to create, modify, disable, or repair; disable a trap, pick a lock, or crack a safe. Use the ubiquitous technology around the sprawl to your advantage.
equine_hybrid_desc: You have four hooved legs and two arms, perfect for keeping pace with most land vehicles. Your hands each have three strong fingers and an opposable thumb, which provide you with a measure of protection against being disarmed.
express_crew: Express the goals, drives, inner conflict, or essential nature of the crew.
faction_alamo_security_notes: An independent security subcontractor that boasts about its tradition of no-holds-barred Texas justice and brutality. Well-known for its persistent personnel. They have teams of bounty hunters and private investigators with southern drawls.
faction_astral_space_conservatory_notes: HQ in nearby Oddworks Hall in Haiti. Research led by former dean of the University of Kingston. This foundation was funded by a powerful dragon's last will and testament to monitor arcane misuse, protect astral space, and restore contaminated astral areas.
faction_atari-tendo_united_notes: The #2 and oldest mega, HQ in Japan. They are a classic Japanese zaibatsu, run in a traditional "family" style, with most employees signing lifetime contracts and even marrying within the corp. Specializes in nuclear power, environmental engineering, biotech, heavy industry, technical service, minerals, military goods, and a whole lot more.
faction_atlantean_foundation_notes: A fanatical group devoting to looking for and into anything and everything that might be connected to arcane power or Thera, Mu, aka the mythical city of Atlantis. In the process they have developed considerable relic-hunting and magic-researching capabilities. A mature dragon recognized the importance of this organization's work by including a donation of a huge sum in his last will & testament. They have not been mentioned in the news lately—perhaps too preoccupied with a recent discovery by their arcane researchers.
faction_august_town_notes: Tiered cliffs, with exclusive residential structures and secure transport to the hovering city overhead. Sky City Gamma and August Town heights are known for their lavish clubs & dining, and exquisite views.
faction_baccarat_notes: An informal, but tightly knit organization that tries to put a positive spin on a hateful message. They run under the guise of civil rights activism, but they are actually classist butt-kissers. They are often spurred to action whenever any one of their own steps outside their class lines or a lower-class group receives some kind of favoritism they've deemed to be unwarranted.
faction_black_circle_notes: A mysterious gathering of mages rumored to be "bound by blood" (whatever that means). It is said they are championed by former elite agents of the Illuminati, Knights Templar, and Freemasons. If you spot people in black robes casting weird mojo, take some notes, call the authorities, and get the hell out of there. Pissing them off is sometimes called "spinning the Black Circle" for the mayhem that ensues.
faction_bodies_unlimited_notes: A corporation and organlegging criminal syndicate headquartered in Kingston. One of the best connected and protected criminal organizations in the world, feared for its secretive ways with high bounties on its leadership. It is rumored to be infiltrated by ghouls (secret and known) and sympathizes with the Infected. Known business is concentrated in the Pacific Rim, Africa, and across the Americas.
faction_british_consulate_notes: A small group of diplomats representing the United Kingdom. They maintain financial ties to the former colony through the growing number of businessmen from "across the pond" who are leeching the wealth of paydata present in Kingston.
faction_brokeback_corrections_notes: A corrections facility rumored to be inescapable. Many ex-runners spend the bulk of their lives with burnt IDNs in here. Several criminal operations are run by convicts from within its walls.
faction_buddhislam_notes: A quasireligious organization of note which was formed from a bastardization of Islamic and Buddhist beliefs. They are known for their zen-like suicide bombers and extremist engineers. They take "explosive" approaches to breaking the elite's control over the illegal ‘ware trade. Their teachings claim that each replacement of the body will grant spiritual enlightenment. They only recently expanded their operations to Central America, but are feared nonetheless.
faction_caliphate_global_notes: The #7 mega (and most recent addition to the Big Seven), HQ in Cairo, Egypt. Focuses on entertainment, telecom, finance, and construction. Almost entirely owned by Nye McFly, a young entrepreneur whose online gambling winnings famously funded their takeover of several conglomerates.
faction_caribbean_league_military_notes: The armed forces of the Caribbean League stationed in Kingston. Garrisons of troops are posted at the Fort Clarence (just south of Portmore, on the coast), aboard the naval destroyer Midnight, and at the Kingston Council's stronghold (a few hundred troops in total).
faction_citizens_on_patrol_notes: Civilian investigators that report to security firms. They have a reputation for ethics and integrity (no one likes them). They often present evidence which help put away runners.
faction_classique_retro_fabrication_note: A custom weaponry shop, whose popularity has swelled among collectors and fanatics in recent years. This is mostly due to their denial of AI-driven replicators, but also their commitment to excellence. Being targeted by the megas for their staunch refusal to allow outside investors.
faction_constant_spring_notes: Ranches with towering vertical gardens, populated by skilled professionals occupying the upper working class. Includes Barbican neighborhood and the foothills along the northern edge of Kingston, most of which has been demolished to make way for the upcoming theme park.
faction_cuban_mafia_notes: An alliance of several crime families, all loyal to El Jefé. Represented locally by the Mannings. An brutally efficient syndicate known for being protective of its allies and quick to anger. Their role in the trafficking of people and drugs is undeniable.
faction_cybersec_global_notes: A vile, manipulative, and greedy organization with expansive power over the flow of data. They primarily serve the interests of the Big Seven and prevent cyberspace and the stock markets from crashing again. Rumored to be able to take control of private citizens' neural implants with ease. It is said that corporate spies actually control the board room here. Some of those who answer for CSG's actions are not even physical; simply AI.
faction_exo_heavy_industries_notes: The #1 mega, HQ in Russia. Involved in military research and development, including weapons, vehicles, chemicals, and aerospace—with a domineering presence in finance and politics. Nearly 100% owned by the Drake family.
faction_faster_than_you_notes: Extreme hover cyclists, drone enthusiasts, and parkour fanatics who sometimes run small shipments of drugs and guns across the streets of Kingston.
faction_getsaround_delivery_notes: Food delivery service provider, whose patented drones can frequently be seen zipping around in swarms to and from office buildings or arcologies. Recently made headlines for "1 billion served through automation."
faction_harborview_notes: This area was once part of Kingston Parish—but is mostly deserted now, and condemned due to its proximity to Port Royal. The Harbor View Roundabout surrounds several hotels and an old commercial district. The abandoned airstrip, raceway, and yacht club in Port Royal are within view of the place, but locals know this is a horrid place: haunted as can be. Best not to go there without a shaman (or a deathwish).
faction_havendale_notes: Suburban blacktop and low-grade arcologies. Middle-class suburbia.
faction_hindenberg_orbital_notes: The #6 mega, HQ in Germany. Primarily concerned with orbital technologies, including geolocation services, lunar transport, mining, solar energy, and chemical engineering. They also own the only government-subsidized orbital cleanup operation, solidifying their global presence and giving them unique access to cutting-edge scientific research.
faction_institute_of_arcane_research_not: Established to further a powerful dragon's magical interests. Working in coordination with Atlantean Foundation, helping ensure these organizations will be formidable players in almost anything even tangentially related to magic for years to come.
faction_kingston_council_notes: Officially dictates new legislation in the commonwealth and organizes public works. They determine the disbursement of the city treasury to various divisions and issue taxation orders. The council members themselves (there are a dozen in all) are elected leaders, directed by the whims of the wealthiest locals. Most other votes go uncounted due to high-level voter fraud and election rigging. The puppet government in Kingston is chock full of greed with an ear in on the inner workings of the corporations. They also preside over the puppet branch of judicial appeals and municipal decision making.
faction_kingston_parish_notes: The location of the docks, the capital building, and Banker's Strip.
faction_labor_party_notes: Neo-anarchists who think citizens should use their rights to reduce the megacorps to rubble. Their families were almost completely eliminated by the People's Party, but they seem determined to rise once again.
faction_legionnaires_notes: The security company tasked with upholding the law. Known as the meanest bunch of thugs in the city. Corrupt, infringing, and despicable.
faction_lord_vladimir_notes: A noble from what was formerly Latvia, said to be "ancient." They enjoy diplomatic immunity in most of the Caribbean League (not Cuba). Controls a number of clearing houses and banks for his extensive worldwide investment portfolio. Probably a vampire.
faction_machina_imperium_notes: A radical movement devoted to the advancement of legislation granting autonomy and citizenship to machine intelligences. Mostly opposed by cyberneticists, quantum programmers, and others who understand the risks of such freedoms. Successfully blocked a recently proposed amendment concerning fully lifelike drones and shells—for now.
faction_mona_notes: Swanky, mountainside homes on narrow precipices, mirrorpane windows. A multitude of tiny designer parks, fancy restaurants, and thin mirrored skyscrapers. Several wealthy neighborhoods overlook the long-condemned (and mostly forgotten) wasteland known as the Kintyre slums.
faction_mad_dance_notes: A feared paramilitary organization of cultists serving an actual devil. Their elites employ hallucinogens, pilot flying suits, and operate in open rebellion to laws designed to respect the dead. They seek to gain knowledge from the past through their "bloody dances"—designed to entice evil entities native to the darker metaplanes.
faction_native_american_consulate_notes: A small representation of diplomats from the Native American nations of North America. Native Americans in Kingston are mostly disdainful towards any loyalists to the former United States—seeing them as traitors to their claims and birthrights.
faction_new_kingston_notes: Corporate arcologies galore. Most areas here are indoors, even the parks. Also features a series of municipal complexes containing the CSG and OTF Field Offices, as well as the Legionnaire's HQ—all centrally located.
faction_manning_family_notes: The local chapter of the Cuban Mafia which answers to El Jefé directly. Ruthless mobsters, notorious for murdering any who challenge them in broad daylight. Their control over the drug trade in St. Andrew is in question, as their former leader Lefty was recently murdered—shattering the tenuous alliance between the Talons and Mountain Rats he brokered.
faction_medsled_notes: The leading private insurance provider. They provide registered clients with armed extraction, guaranteed anonymity (at least until death), and access to a wide variety of medical services normally unavailable to the undocumented.
faction_mexitech_logistics_notes: The #4 mega, HQ in a platinum palace in Mexico City (capital of the Empire of Mexico). They've got their hands in more pockets than just about any other mega, and their public relations campaigns are second to none—which is good, because they're also all about blood magic and evil conspiracies. The Mexican Empress has them protected as a government contractor, and the rest of the Americas depends on them for a variety of their daily needs. Many Panamanians despise this mega due to beliefs that they manipulate the weather to profit.
faction_mountain_rats_notes: Vicious go-gangers known for their gratuitous use of face paint, powerful chemicals & explosives, and daredevil motorbiking. Often seen wielding neon baseball bats wrapped in razor wire.
faction_mirrors_edge_notes: An underground online community consisting of an array of exceptional shadow minds gathered by Mirror to be a filter between the normies and the hacker elite. Mirror, perhaps the best hacker the world has ever seen, had to step down recently, but the group is still going strong.
faction_murphys_lunar_notes: This international corporation owns the largest lunar transport service in the Americas and a huge solar utility company. They shuttle rich people from their private launchpad in the Cayman Islands to the colony on the dark side of Earth's moon, and they own the majority of the solar arrays on the other side.
faction_neo-catholic_church_notes: The closest thing to a "state religion" in Kingston, though not nearly as influential as they used to be. They abhor the corrupted spirit world and do their best to discredit those who upload their consciousness to cyberspace. Said to pay well for discreet exorcists and ancient historical texts.
faction_nukem_foods_notes: Their food printing services include complementary microwaving and many streets license their devices to quickly prepare food and pick up trash. Their company would be much bigger if not for malfunctioning drone designs, and other unfortunate "mishaps."
faction_occult_task_force_notes: Authorities who track supernatural crimes. They serve the Caribbean League government directly and are legally distinct from Kingston's law enforcement apparatus. OTF agents are known for their stylish suits and dark glasses. They keep a warding focus as a special defense against being targeted by magic, and are masters of counterspelling and nullifying supernatural power.
faction_otaku_remnant_notes: A group of Japanese hackers descended from or allegiant to the Otaku, children who found themselves able to see and manipulate data naturally after the Awakening. It is rumored they died out, but some theorize that they are simply in hiding—still worshiping a dangerous AI.
faction_panamanian_consulate_notes: A small representation of diplomats from the Panamanian Union with certain immunities; they will kill anyone, even their own kind, for trying to move in on their monopoly over the supernatural metal trade. They control a large portion of the gun trade as well through decades-old legislation and gang alliances.
faction_peoples_party_notes: A gang whose members hold various positions of power throughout the city. The elderly parents of the new generation are feared for the elimination of their rivals, the Labor Party (and their families!) using deadly nanobots.
faction_petrovski_security_notes: The recent rival for Alamo's security contracts in the city. Led by a couple of ex-runners named Mr. and Mrs. Terminator—a couple of vodka-drinking Ukrainians with bodies full of implants, who employ a number of Russian loyalists and a fair number of ex-Red Army personnel. Long ago Mrs. Terminator acquired a large piece of land following the first Great Crash. They're hiding something, but no one knows what because they've surrounded their property with a massive wall and backed it up with pretty impressive security. What's happening in there is anyone's guess—and there's plenty of guessing going on.
faction_protean_biotech_notes: The biotechnology specialists responsible for much of the printed flesh and cloned organs across the world. They also own a variety of interests in agriculture and pharmaceuticals. Recently targeted the #8 mega and bankrupt them through clones infiltrating their board.
faction_rack_notes: Desperate North American refugees seeking fame on the high seas, leading a bunch of convicts from Brokeback tasked with guarding Kingston Bay against dangerous sea creatures. They service businesses approved by the warden of Brokeback Corrections, and officially sanctioned nautical salvage operations and occasional reinforcements for maritime authorities.
faction_scraps_notes: Homeless children, beggars, hoodlums, and thieves who roam the sprawl. An impressive gossip network.
faction_sewerton_notes: A vast and ancient underground network of sewer pipes and flooded passageways. Hidden throughout are said to be secret paths in and out of various parts of the city, but official reports say those are long since blocked off. There's at least one entrance that is always open in Trench Town.
faction_sky_wardens_notes: Well-trained pilots authorized to police the skies with force.
faction_sinokatsu_dynamics_notes: The #3 mega, HQ in the Free City of Hong Kong. The resulting merger of former manufacturing mega Sinowei Industries and financial mega Trionkatsu Enterprises. Its board suffers from high turnover due to vicious infighting and deadly politics. Controls a technology consortium focused on advancing legislature concerning the variety of utility companies they own (recently seeking to takeover Murphy's Lunar). They are known for their experimental research & development into higher science fields including spacecraft, cryogenics, and particle physics.
faction_standrew_parish_notes: Location of posh areas like Russell Heights (Uptown) as well as rougher neighborhoods that are a hotbed for petty theft and gang shootings; home to a no-fire zone in and around the Half Way Tree restaurant (on the north end, near New Kingston), good for runners to meet up and make connections.
faction_sudushima_partners_notes: Microchip manufacturer and cybernetic research & development firm, with strong ties to Kingston University. Many of their employees are students groomed through the Beacon Academy of Technology, which they fund and manage privately.
faction_talons_notes: Legitimate sailors turned arms dealers. Their symbol is that of an eagle claw clutching a rifle. Many are war vets and seasoned mercenaries. Their vehicles often feature hardened plating, armed drone escorts, and powerful military weaponry.
faction_trench_town_notes: A highly populated residential area littered with broken streets, ramshackle apartments, dilapidated homes, atop decaying infrastructure. Made famous by Bob Marley. The airport bridge crosses it, and there is a known entrance to Sewerton in this area, though no one likes to talk about what's down there.
faction_tritanium_partners_notes: The #5 mega. HQ on the mobile ocean platform stationed near the Pacific coast of North America, known as Dusk City. CEO is elderly, their life sustained through self-experimentation with cutting-edge chemicals and bioengineering. Their focus is on transhumanist technologies ranging from cloning to cybernetics, and other even more "out-there" projects designed to take humanity to the next era of advancement. Also owns LifeLift Medical Services, competitor to MedSled. They own their own space station, and are rumored to have an experimental base on the moon too.
faction_uber-besos_notes: The combined remnants of two former megacorporations, trying to make a comeback. They focus on automated technologies for transportation and delivery, and have their fingers in a number of other related industries including entertainment, finance, manufacturing, and consumer products.
faction_underteeth_notes: An up-and-coming gang of thieves who wear matching baseball caps and call various hubs in Sewerton their turf. Their symbol is a set of sharpened incisors. Grinder, a former runner and demolitionist, turned neo-anarchist, now leads this deadly bunch of terrorists and instigators—and sign their deals in blood and ash.
faction_violet_twins_notes: Parolees on house arrest in Barbican, refusing to vacate the premises. A gathering of citizens awaits their next public prayer.
faction_welshire_holdings_notes: Largest network of banks in Kingston. Launders money for the Yakuza and numerous foreign interests through diversified portfolios.
faction_xxiii_notes: A vile group that is obsessed with numerology and lets free spirits possess them to grant them great power. No one can be certain of its membership, but they went dark around the time that...
faction_yakuza_notes: HQ and oyabun (leader) in Japan. Atari-Tendo uses Yakuza foot soldiers to do their dirty work, while the Yakuza uses Uber-Besos as the greatest money-laundering organization the world has ever seen. One big, fraggin' happy family.
faerie_desc: You are Tiny (mouse size, scale -2). Your body exudes a small amount of light when you move. Among other things, this means you can't use equipment that is normal-sized (a typical concealed holdout pistol is like a cannon for you). You will typically accomplish less when you take a physical action; take advantage of your size to escape, avoid notice, and otherwise be a pest.
fight_description: Fight with an opponent in close combat; assault or hold a position; brawl and wrestle.
fill_fields: Fill in sheet fields automatically upon entering or changing playbook or crew type
finesse_description: Finesse an item from someone's pocket; employ subtle misdirection or sleight-of-hand; handle a vehicle or a mount.
flexible_width: Flexible character sheet width (adapts to container)
foolish_pride_desc: Regain 1 edge when you roll a critical on a desperate action roll.
free_spirit_viceblurb: You have an intense need: living essence. To satisfy this need, possess a living victim and consume their essence (this may be a downtime action). When you do so, clear half your drain (round down).
fun-sized_desc: You're not fast by default (even at light loadout), but that's okay because you remain inconspicuous at normal loadout. People tend to underestimate your kind (and stature).
functions_info: to guard — to destroy — to discover — to acquire — to labor at <small>...that which my owner commands.</small>
gatherinfo_how_can_I_get_them: How can I get them to [X]?
gatherinfo_what_can_I_interface: What can I interface with here?
gatherinfo_what_do_they_intend: What do they intend to do?
gatherinfo_what_drives_them: What drives them to do this?
gatherinfo_what_is_arcane: What is arcane or weird here?
gatherinfo_what_is_emergent: What is emergent or weird here?
gatherinfo_what_is_mystical: What is mystical or weird here?
gatherinfo_what_should_I_look: What should I look out for?
gatherinfo_what_will_cause_chaos: What will cause the most chaos?
glamour_desc: You are completely invisible when you have a light loadout, and concealed by magical obfuscation when you have a normal loadout. Spend 1 edge to illuminate your body or remain visible for several minutes. Upon your death, your released essence renders your corpse invisible. You might still be detected through supernatural awareness or special sensors. The GM will make a fortune roll if the quality of your glamour is ever put to the test.
goblindesc: Goblins are vile, wretched looking things with pale green or dark green skin. They have crooked noses, long spindly fingers, and reddish corneas. Their lifespan tends to be rather short, and their patience much shorter.
graceful_desc: You can choose to spend only 1 edge when you resist a consequence of social pressure, regardless of the result of your roll.
heavy_frames: A hulking mech, a self-driving electric motorcycle.
heritage_info: Africe — Americas — Asia — Europe — Oceania — Other
horned_desc: You have horns on your head that make great goring weapons. These tend to make people nervous (with good reason). You may decide you had one (or both) of your horns (and this trait) removed.
humandesc: The benefits of being human are optional, but maybe you benefited from your privilege—knowingly or not.
infected_viceblurb: Your vice is life essence, consumed from a living person. Use 1 downtime activity to Stalk prey and indulge your vice. Also, when you feed, mark 4 ticks on your healing clock. This is the only way you can heal. How do you feed? What telltale sign do you leave on your victims?
influence_description: Influence someone with charm, logic, deception, disguise, or bluff; change attitudes or behavior with manipulation or seduction.
interface_description: Interface with cyberspace or harness networked devices; execute software or understand aspects of information technology.
intuition_description: Resist consequences from deception or understanding.
legs_info: Choose which leg(s) and up to 2 features
lighting_gear_description: A string of work lights, kinetically-charging flashlight or lantern, adjustable headlamp, or other light source.
lineage_info: Dwarf — Elf — Human — Ork — Troll — Other
list_crews: Assassins, Couriers, Cult, Mercs, Shadows, or adicals.
list_playbooks: Face, Hacker, Muscle, Punk, Rigger, Snake, Trigger, Adept, Mage, or Techno.
lizardfolkdesc: Lizardfolk tend to work nightjobs, getting sun in the daytime to feed their hungry endothermic bodies. They produce little or no heat signature and are silent killers when they want to be
low-light_vision_desc: You can see in low-light as well as if it were well-lit.
loyal_desc: Choose another NPC on your list who is "close"
magical_senses_desc: Spend 1 edge to sense nearby magic for several minutes. Detect a nearby mage, feel the presence of a spell, etc.
mechanic_tools_description: A set of heavy tools for working on machinery: gas-powered jack stands, heavy clamps, air compressor, large screwdrivers & wrenches, heavy nuts & bolts, etc.
medium_frames: A cybernetic humanoid, a mechanical animal.
movement_features_info: Communal — Disclosure — Tyranny — Advancement — Splintered — Secrecy — Anarchy — Preservation
name: Name
newby_desc: Choose one fewer special ability (counts as two)
numbskull_desc: Spend 1 edge to ignore a harm penalty (including incapacitation) for an action.
obsidifolkdesc: Rock people. They are magically infused stone golems. Very weird to see.
orkdesc: Orks have monstrous, deformed features and green skin, but are otherwise vaguely human-like. A child of an ork and another magical lineage will undoubtedly be an ork. Orks can be born of any lineage though.
oversized_desc: You're not inconspicuous by default (even with a light loadout), but that's okay because you are not slower at a heavy loadout (and can carry +1 load before you're encumbered). People tend to fear your kind—and for good reason!
pack_mentality_desc: You get +1 scale when grouped up with another of your kind.
pixiedesc: Pixies are small humanoids with insect-like wings. They are known for their mischievous, child-like behavior. Should you manage to become Infected as a pixie, you become a “tooth fairy” that hungers for fresh teeth (the younger, the better).
planningdesc: Choose a plan, provide the detail. Choose your load limit for the operation.
playbook_ability_a_little_jing_on_the_si: A Little Jing on the Side
At the end of each downtime phase, you earn +2 stash.
playbook_ability_ace_description: You can Finesse a vehicle to takeoff, control, or land it—regardless of its means of propulsion. You gain potency when you make difficult maneuvers while piloting a vehicle.
playbook_ability_adaptable_description: Spend 2 edge to roll your best action rating while performing a different action. Say how you adapt your skills to this use.
playbook_ability_adept_senses_descriptio: Spend 1 edge to perceive beyond normal limits for several minutes. Detect subtle environmental changes (temperature, frequency, pressure, etc.), sense the presence of danger, become a living lie detector, etc.
playbook_ability_ambitious_description: You gain an additional karma trigger: You defended your fixers or tried to get more. If your crew followed your lead, also mark crew xp.
playbook_ability_ambush_description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.
playbook_ability_astral_mind_description: You're always aware of astral entities in your presence. You get +1d to gather information about the arcane by any means.
playbook_ability_astral_occultist_descri: You know the secret ways to Consort with ancient powers, forgotten mentors, or dragons. Once you've consorted with one, you get +1d to Command cultists who worship it.
playbook_ability_astral_projection_descr: You may project your consciousness into the astral plane to "see" a small room across the district as if it were nearby. Spend 2 edge when you project, plus 1 edge for each extra feature: project further (across the sprawl, across the country, etc)—you can be seen or heard—it lasts longer (a few minutes, an hour, etc.).
playbook_ability_astral_void_description: You are invisible to spiritual entities and may not be harmed by them. Spend 2 edge to cause living things to avert their gaze and fail to observe you for a few moments.
playbook_ability_astral_warrior_descript: You can infuse your hands, melee weapons, or tools with astral power. You gain potency in combat against astral entities. You may choose this ability again to select an elemental energy type you wield when you do this (and you may spend 1 edge to wield it as a ranged weapon): fire—ice—electricity—air.
playbook_ability_autonomic_control_descr: Spend 1 edge to control your vital functions and autonomic response for several minutes. Feign death convincingly, fool a lie detector test, ignore pain, hold your breath with impunity, etc.
playbook_ability_awakened_description: Choose an arcane method, and a number of drawbacks as directed by your choice. You may choose to roll the Assense action. When you roll a desperate Assense action, mark 1 karma on the Willpower track. You may take additional action dots in the Assense action as a Willpower advance. You can never become Emergent or a Practitioner of the Way.
playbook_ability_beyond_driven_descripti: You gain an additional karma trigger: When you get away from or stand up to "the Man." You get +1 edge box.
playbook_ability_beyond_human_descriptio: Choose Intuition, Body, or Willpower. Your max rating for actions under that attribute becomes 5. When you take this ability, add +1d to resistance rolls with this attribute.
playbook_ability_bodyguard_description: When you protect a teammate, take +1d to your resistance roll. When you gather info to anticipate possible threats in the current situation, you get +1 effect.
playbook_ability_boosted_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of physical force that verges on the superhuman—engage a small team on equal footing in close combat.
playbook_ability_captivating_description: You can hold the attention of a bigger group of people than normal. You may Consort with a completely hostile target as if they were a friend.
playbook_ability_catch_me_if_you_can_des: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of escape or stealth.
playbook_ability_chained_description: You are bound to a physical item (your chain) that prevents your destruction. You can take 1 drain to strongly interact with it and those nearby it for a few hours (to move it, protect it, etc). If you suffer fatal harm or torment while your chain is not destroyed, your spirit is banished. You suffer level-3 harm, "Incapacitated" instead, and quickly travel to your chain's physical location. If your chain should ever manage to be destroyed, you immediately suffer a level of torment.
playbook_ability_chemist_description: When you invent or craft a creation with chemical features, take +1 result level to your roll (a 1-3 becomes a 4/5, etc). You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_compiler_description: You can Attune with cyberspace to force a nearby emergent entity to appear before you and obey an order you give it. You are never jacked by an emergent entity that you summon or attempt to compile (though your allies may be).
playbook_ability_conditioned_description: From hard-won experience or painstaking trials, you are immune to the first symptom of lost essence you add. You never suffer trauma due to reconditioning.
playbook_ability_conduit_description: You may release some of your stored energy as an electrical shock around you or as a focused arc of electricity. You may also use this ability to generate a barrier to repel or trap signals. Spend 1 energy for each level of magnitude.
playbook_ability_conjurer_description: You can Assense to force a nearby astral entity to appear before you and obey a command you give it. You are never terrified by a astral entity you summon or attempt to conjure (though your allies may be).
playbook_ability_connected_description: During downtime, you get +1 result level (a 1-3 becomes a 4-5, etc.) when you acquire an asset or reduce heat.
playbook_ability_daredevil_description: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.
playbook_ability_data_analyst_descriptio: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new design plan.
playbook_ability_deadeye_description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: make a ranged attack at extreme distance beyond what's normal for the weapon—create viable ranged trajectories using ricochet or arcs.
playbook_ability_dead_zone_description: You're consciousness disrupts nearby signals. Spend 1 edge to do one of the following: turn it off until you're ready—nearby devices are also orphaned—the crew is unaffected.
playbook_ability_deal_shark_description: You are not affected by quality or Tier when you negotiate the terms of a deal.
playbook_ability_digital_warden_descript: When you Interface with a comm using subterfuge supplies (preventing any other use), it becomes veiled or obvious to security devices (your choice).
playbook_ability_disarming_description: You get +1d vs. a target with whom you have an intimate relationship.
playbook_ability_dissipate_description: You can disperse the concentrated energy of your free spirit form in order to pass through solid objects for a moment. Take 1 drain when you dissipate, plus 1 drain for each feature: It lasts longer (a minute—an hour—a day)—you also become invisible—anything that passes through your spirit form becomes engulfed by a sorcerous energy type you wield (fire, ice, lightning, or wind).
playbook_ability_dropout_description: When your result on a resistance roll is a 1-3 (choose one) mark 1 karma or roll another die and take the better result. Your participation in a group action never costs the leader any edge, regardless of your result.
playbook_ability_editor_description: You may expend your special armor to resist an emergent consequence, or to push yourself to contend with or employ emergent power.
playbook_ability_electrician_description: When you invent or craft a creation with electronic features, take +1 result level to your roll (a 1-3 becomes a 4/5, etc). You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_emergent_description: Choose an emergent method and a number of drawbacks as directed by your choice. You may choose to roll the Attune action. When you roll a desperate Attune action, mark 1 karma on your Willpower track. You may take additional action dot(s) in the Attune action as a Willpower advance. When there is a question whether your consciousness is online, the answer is yes (you can spend 1 edge to ignore this for a time). You can never become Awakened or a Practitioner of the Way.
playbook_ability_emergent_mind_descripti: You're always aware of emergent phenomena in your presence. Take +1d whenever you gather info about the emergent by any means.
playbook_ability_emergent_occultist_desc: You know the secret ways to Consort with artificial intelligence, forgotten paragons, or gremlins. Once you've consorted with one, you get +1d to Command cultists who worship it.
playbook_ability_emergent_proxy_descript: You may proxy your consciousness into the emergent realms to go online as if you are somewhere else across the district. Spend 2 edge when you project, plus 1 edge for each extra feature: further away (across the city, across the region, etc)—your living persona is visible as if originating there—it lasts longer (a few minutes, an hour, etc.).
playbook_ability_enchanter_description: You know the ancient methods to invent and craft creations with arcane features. You can Study a design (or create a new one) to produce a magical focus or alchemical. You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_focused_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of surprise or mental strain (fear, confusion, losing track of someone), or to push yourself for ranged combat or tracking.
playbook_ability_foresight_description: Two times per run you can assist a teammate without spending edge. Tell us how you prepared for this.
playbook_ability_formidable_description: You may expend your special armor to reduce harm from an attack in combat, or to push yourself during a battle.
playbook_ability_fraggin_adept_descripti: You can push yourself to do one of the following: perform a feat of acrobatics that verges on the superhuman—maneuver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other.
playbook_ability_frame_upgrade_descripti: Choose an additional frame feature (can be taken more than once).
playbook_ability_free_spirit_form_descri: When you become a free spirit, you get this trait for free. You now exist as a concentration of vaporous essence that resembles your living body and clothes. You may weakly interact with the physical world and vice versa. You're vulnerable to arcane powers and electromagnetic effects. You move about by floating and may fly swiftly without tiring. You may slowly flow through small openings as a vapor. You chill the area around you and are terrifying for the living to behold. You are affected by banishing foci (you may make a resistance roll to overcome the repulsion). Whenever you would spend edge (or lose it), take drain instead. When you would take trauma, take torment instead. You gain the Awakened maneuver from the Mage playbook (and if you had it before, you keep it).
playbook_ability_fully_integrated_descri: You may Interface with the local power grid to control it or something connected to it (including another shell).
playbook_ability_ghost_in_the_shell_desc: You are a brain controlling a cybernetic frame through the neural interface in your brain capsule (a brain in a jar). You have human-like strength and senses, by default. Your shell has natural armor (this doesn't count for load) and a full suite of integrated communications software. Your former feelings, interests, and connections are only dim memories. You now exist to fulfill your functions. Choose three (at left). You may be rebuilt if severely damaged or destroyed, unless your brain capsule is shattered. Whenever you would spend edge (or lose it), spend energy instead.
playbook_ability_gun_control_description: You can draw and reload firearms quickly, regardless of weapon type. You get +1d to rolls to unleash a barrage of rapid fire at an enemy.
playbook_ability_heightened_senses_descr: Spend 1 edge to sense beyond human limits. "Hear" a subject's true thoughts or feelings, see thermographically, sense the presence of invisible things, intuit the location of a hidden object, etc.
playbook_ability_in_control_description: When you harness networked devices in AR, you are never distracted. You can spend 1 edge to take action with your physical body, regardless of interface mode.
playbook_ability_incorrigible_descriptio: When you indulge your vice, you may adjust the dice outcome by 1 or 2 (up or down). An ally who joins in your vice may do the same.
playbook_ability_infectee_description: You are a person whose spirit is trapped in an infected body. Your trauma is maxed out. Choose four traumas to reflect your vampiric nature. Arcane attacks are potent against you, and exposure to sunlight quickly causes you to become fatigued. If you suffer fatal harm or trauma, you don't die, but your infected will is overwhelmed. You take level 3 harm: "Incapacitated" until you feed enough to recover. If you suffer harm the rays of the sun or a wooden stake through the heart while in this state, you are destroyed utterly. Your karma tracks are longer (you now advance more slowly). You have 12 edge boxes instead of 9.
playbook_ability_infiltrator_description: You are not affected by quality or Tier when you bypass security measures.
playbook_ability_instancer_description: You know the secret methods to invent and craft a creation with emergent features. You can Study a design (or create a new one) to produce an emergent focus or widget. You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_iron_will_description: You're immune to the terror that some supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with Willpower.
playbook_ability_jury_rig_description: When you Engineer a device to repair or alter it, the work is much quicker than it should be and you don't need all the parts (or tools).
playbook_ability_killer_pet_description: Your hunting pet gets +1d when tracking or fighting injured targets, and gains a special ability: crowd control — sapience — swift. Take this ability again to choose an additional special ability for your pet.
playbook_ability_linguist_description: You can understand bits and pieces of any dialect, even those you never learned. You can spend 1 edge to hold a conversation despite language barriers.
playbook_ability_long_con_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from suspicion or persuasion, or to push yourself when you gather information or work on a long-term project.
playbook_ability_master_of_disguise_desc: When you use a disguise or other form of covert misdirection, you get +1d to rolls to confuse or deflect suspicion. When you throw off your disguise, the resulting surprise gives you the initiative in the situation.
playbook_ability_materialize_description: Take 1 drain to flow through the supernatural pathways of the metaplanes in order to instantly travel to your haunt, or to answer the summoning call of a Conjurer
playbook_ability_medic_description: You can Engineer bones, blood, and bodily tissues to treat injuries or stabilize the dying. You may Study an ailment or corpse. Take this ability a second time to count as the crew's surgeon and grant everyone in the crew (including you) +1d to their recovery rolls.
playbook_ability_meticulous_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from hacking or to push yourself when you contend with or employ software.
playbook_ability_militant_description: When you Command a cohort in combat, they continue to fight when they would be otherwise broken (they're not taken out when they suffer level 3 harm). They gain +1 effect and 1 armor.
playbook_ability_mist_form_description: You can shift into slow-moving mist for about a minute. While you remain in this form, you can only be harmed by supernatural means. Spend 1 edge when you shift, plus 1 edge for each extra feature: you can strongly interact with the physical world—you move at normal speed—you also become invisible.
playbook_ability_mobility_description: When you Prowl, you cover much more ground than you should and your movement is very difficult to predict.
playbook_ability_mule_description: Your load limits are higher. Light: 5. Normal: 7. Heavy: 8.
playbook_ability_mystic_way_description: You may roll the Assense or Attune action (rated at 1 dot). Take this adept feat again (a number of times equal to your Willpower), each time gaining (choose one) an appropriate secret art or an additional supernatural action dot.
playbook_ability_specter_description: Take 1 drain to strongly interact with the physical world for a few moments (as if you had a normal body). Extend the reach and magnitude of your interaction to include telekinetic force and electromagnetic force by taking more drain (2-6).
playbook_ability_possess_description: You may Assense to take control of a living body. When your control is challenged, you must re-Assense (risking harm) or leave the body. Your control is challenged when: you consume essence from the host—when supernatural powers act against you—when the host's will is driven to desperation. You may easily and indefinitely possess a vessel which has been ritually prepared for you (change your playbook).
playbook_ability_practitioner_descriptio: Choose an adept way and an adept drawback. You may roll to resist supernatural consequences with Body. You can never become Awakened or Emergent. Note: Also assign three starting action dots during creation however you want among the four actions appropriate for your chosen way.
playbook_ability_precise_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of distraction, misunderstanding, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or precision.
playbook_ability_programmer_description: When you invent or craft a creation with software features, you get +1 result level to your roll (a 1-3 becomes a 4/5, etc.). You begin with one special design already known.
playbook_ability_provocateur_description: When you taunt someone, it's especially provocative. You get +1d to Study a provoked target.
playbook_ability_quantum_consciousness_d: Choose an additional frame, also selecting a size (small, medium, or heavy), its look, and a starting feature. You may transfer your consciousness between your frames at will.
playbook_ability_reflexes_description: When there's a question about who acts first, the answer is you (two characters with Reflexes act simultaneously).
playbook_ability_relentless_description: Due to harsh experience or training, if there is a question whether you're sleepy, hungry, or thirsty, the answer is no. You get +1 edge box.
playbook_ability_resilient_description: You recover from harm faster. Permanently fill in one of your healing clock segments. You get +1d to healing recovery rolls.
playbook_ability_ring_leader_description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action using that action, you can only lose 1 edge at most regardless of the number of failed rolls.
playbook_ability_savage_description: When you unleash physical violence, it's especially frightening. When you Command a frightened target, take +1d.
playbook_ability_scout_description: When you gather information to locate a target, you get +1 effect When you hide in a prepared position or use camouflage, you get +1d to rolls to avoid detection.
playbook_ability_search_protocol_descrip: You are always aware of online devices in your presence. Take +1d when you gather information about high-technology by any means.
playbook_ability_signal_tuner_descriptio: When you Interface the range is much greater than it should be and the signals are well-hidden from casual inspection.
playbook_ability_smooth_description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from social pressure or disinterest, or to push yourself to improve someone's attitude.
playbook_ability_sorcerer_description: You know the unique methods to activate metaplanar energies through your body to cast spells. You can Study a spell formula to summon a supernatural effect. You begin with two spells already learned.
playbook_ability_sprawl_whisperer_descri: You gain +1d to Consort when you gather information on a target for a run. You get +1d to the engagement roll for that operation.
playbook_ability_street_code_description: You gain an additional karma trigger: When you uphold the street code of honor despite difficulty or danger. When you duel someone worthy (one on one), also mark crew karma.
playbook_ability_superior_machine_descri: Choose any three actions. Your max rating for the chosen actions becomes 5. When you take this ability, add +1d to resistance rolls against consequences of your features.
playbook_ability_takes_one_to_know_one_d: You can always tell when someone is lying to you.
playbook_ability_terrible_power_descript: Spend 1 edge to perform a feat of superhuman strength or speed (run faster than a car, break stone with bare hands, leap onto the roof of a building, etc.). This factors into effect.
playbook_ability_threader_description: You know the unique methods to activate metaplanar energies through your body to cast emergent spells (threads). You can Study an emergent algorithm to summon an emergent effect. You begin with two threads already learned.
playbook_ability_time_manager_descriptio: Due to your careful planning, during downtime, you may give yourself or another crew member +1 downtime activity.
playbook_ability_tough_as_nails_descript: Penalties from harm are one level less severe (though level 4 harm is still fatal).
playbook_ability_transmorphic_descriptio: You can morph your face or change the color of your skin, making you difficult to recognize for several minutes. Spend 1 edge when you morph, plus 1 edge for each special feature: the change lasts longer (an hour, a few hours, etc)—accompanying build change—accompanying voice alteration.
playbook_ability_trust_me_description: You may use teamwork maneuvers with any crew member who trusts you, regardless of the distance separating you. Ask the teammates who trusts you after they pick their load for the run. You can force any character who trusts you to perform the protect maneuver on your behalf (they suffer a consequence instead of you).
playbook_ability_veteran_description: Choose a special ability from another source (can be taken more than once).
playbook_ability_vigilante_description: You gain an additional karma trigger: You exacted justice on someone who harmed you or someone you care about. If your crew helped you exact justice, also mark crew karma.
playbook_ability_virtual_fighter_descrip: When you make a resistance roll for harm from cyberspace, you get +1d. You are immune to being jacked.
playbook_ability_warded_description: You can expend your special armor to resist an arcane consequence, or to push yourself when you employ or contend with arcane forces.
playbook_adept_drawback_description_0: Your access to your adept feats costs you 1 nuyen per downtime to keep active.
playbook_adept_drawback_description_1: You take +1 heat the first time you use an adept feat on a run.
playbook_adept_drawback_description_2: Each downtime phase, you must spend one downtime activity meditating and practicing in a safe spot (or else lose 1 edge).
playbook_adept_method_description_0: Empowerment through the perfection of your intellect and instincts. The cap on your rating for all four Intuition actions is one higher than normal.
playbook_adept_method_description_1: Empowerment through the perfection of your health and fitness. The cap on your rating for all four Body actions is one higher than normal.
playbook_adept_method_description_2: Empowerment through the perfection of your personality and resolve. The cap on your rating for all four Willpower actions is one higher than normal.
playbook_adept_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with inner perfection or mystical power.
playbook_face_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with charisma or conspiracy.
playbook_free_spirit_description: An echo of life between two worlds
playbook_free_spirit_xp_condition: You exacted vengeance upon those you deem deserving, express your outrage or suffering, or settle scores from your background or heritage.
playbook_hacker_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with information or cybercrime.
playbook_infected_description:
A person infected
with the
vampire virus
playbook_infected_drawback_description_0: In downtime, you must spend one activity resting in a dark, silent place (or else lose 3 edge). Your skin pales and the rays of the sun can set your flesh ablaze with supernatural flames.
playbook_infected_drawback_description_1: Your body is less buoyant, making it harder to swim or stay afloat. You may no longer indulge to heal harm from the rays of the sun (you may heal it using the normal methods though).
playbook_infected_drawback_description_2: You may only safely consume metahuman blood without getting sick, and experience nausea if you consume anything else. Alcohol is extremely poisonous to you.
playbook_infected_drawback_description_3: Those who get near you catch the unmistakable odor of decay; those who observe your astral resonance find a vacuous hole where your living essence should be.
playbook_infected_drawback_description_4: Your spirit must remain in this body, or be destroyed.
playbook_infected_xp_condition: You displayed your superiority, or spread the infection without mercy.
playbook_item_a_configured_drone_descrip: An electromechanical device capable of locomotion with human-like senses, configured to accept your commands and perform subroutines. Feature(s) can be added for an additional special item choice.
playbook_item_a_scratch-built_cyberdeck_: A comm, modified to allow the trained user to spot hidden data trails and quietly exploit them. Choose one feature of your cyberdeck: buffered—overclocked—simple—smart. You might execute illegal warez through a cyberdeck to do even more.
playbook_item_a_paracritter_description: This critter follows you around and may help you out with your affairs, on occasion. They function as a cohort (Expert: of a type you choose) and may be arcane in nature. What is strange about its appearance or physiology? What is exotic about its diet or needs?
playbook_item_a_personal_vehicle_descrip: A small vehicle, suitable for manual piloting (with a license) or autonomous transport of one or two people by either land or sea. Flying or underwater capability can be added to your personal vehicle for an additional special item choice.
playbook_item_a_technocritter_descriptio: This critter follows you around and may help you out with your affairs, on occasion. They function as a cohort (Expert: your choice what type), and may be emergent in nature. What is strange about its appearance or physiology? What is exotic about its diet or needs?
playbook_item_a_trained_hunting_pet_desc: Your animal companion obeys your commands and anticipates your actions. Cohort (Expert: Hunter).
playbook_item_banishing_focus_descriptio: A small arcane trinket that astral entities prefer to avoid when possessed by a bonded user.
playbook_item_blackmail_supplies_descrip: Compromising or injurious information, consisting of recorded conversations, embarrassing video, or incriminating physical evidence.
playbook_item_blueprints_description: Access to a database of useful architectural projections and city plans. Feel free to specify which plans you've loaded on your device when you choose this item on a run.
playbook_item_concealed_holdout_pistol_d: A low caliber firearm that is very small and easily concealed in a sleeve or jacket. This pistol is very difficult to detect on your person, even if you're searched.
playbook_item_containment_manacles_descr: A set of self-latching manacles and impact-resistant chain, suitable for quickly restraining a prisoner. A souvenir from an escape from security or a background in law enforcement, perhaps?
playbook_item_entourage_description: Three to five bodyguards, fans, and retainers who are loyal only to you. They have quality equal to your Tier when they can help (they are quality 0 otherwise).
playbook_item_explosives_description: A strap worn around the body, fitted with clips to secure three electronic bombs. During downtime, you automatically refill your explosives, so long as you have reasonable access to a supplier or workshop.
playbook_item_fine_arcane_reagents_descr: A pinch of desecrated grave dirt. Prayer beads and bones. A smattering of awakened organic material. In what strange way do they quickly deteriorate upon use? From which of your friends or contacts do you source these exotic items?
playbook_item_fine_astral_weapon_descrip: A one- or two-handed blade or stave that is effective against arcane entities (spirits, etc.) for the bonded user. When you're bonded to this focus, your attacks with it can strongly interact with astral forms, rather than weakly interact. Is this an heirloom weapon, or a more modern design that you or someone famous painstakingly crafted?
playbook_item_fine_brutal_weapons_descri: A finely crafted heavy weapon designed for devastating brutality. A hunting shotgun. A razor-sharp katana. A set of vicious claws. A brutal weapon like this might give you potency when the power or reach of the weapon is a factor. Is this a well-crafted standard item, or something more exotic, like a Polynesian war club, or a weighted staff edged with jagged metal?
playbook_item_fine_clothes_description: A suit of clothes that marks you as either an important executive, soldier of rank, or undisputed leader of a gang, with all the appropriate badges, medals, and accoutrement.
playbook_item_fine_cover_identity_descri: Fake licenses and business holo-cards, planted stories and rumors, and false relationships sufficient to pass as a different person.
playbook_item_fine_disguise_kit_descript: A vial of pheromones and a thermoplastic mask kit equipped with an impressive array of expert appliances to fool the eyes and ears.
playbook_item_fine_electrical_tools_desc: A specialized set of tools suitable for detailed electronic work. Precision sensors and measuring devices.
playbook_item_fine_emergent_reagents_des: A refined pinch of overheated server-processor dust. A datachip full of memes mined from a hotspot. Emergent signal captures from a corrupted device, virtual construct, etc. In what strange way do they quickly deteriorate upon use? From which of your friends or contacts do you source these exotic items?
playbook_item_fine_fake_cyberdeck_descri: A burner comm that simulates benign civilian use and is hidden inside an expertly-crafted case. An excellent cover for your special talents. It's very difficult to detect it's a fake, even if the device or its signals are scrutinized.
playbook_item_fine_filtering_focus_descr: An item worn over the head eyes produced with fine stranded metals that allows the bonded user to see data trails in great detail. Also provides some measure of protection against cyberspace harm. What does yours look like? Why is it memorable and cryptic to see in use?
playbook_item_fine_firearms_mod_descript: You have access to a variety of accessories which alter the dynamics of a firearm to which they are attached.
playbook_item_fine_mystic_body_art_descr: A branding or piercing of the flesh that allows the bearer to focus and expand their adept potential. Each piece of mystic body art is supernaturally bonded to you (considered a focus), uniquely artistic, and painstaking to remove. What does yours look like? What makes it memorable and impressive to see?
playbook_item_fine_nightlife_subscriptio: Prepaid credit usable at popular clubs and restaurants across the city, potent both in its ability to intoxicate and its ability to impress. Does your fixers take care of veiling the records—or maybe one of your contacts or close friends?
playbook_item_fine_outfit_description: A suit of clothes that marks you as either an important executive, soldier of rank, or undisputed leader of a gang, with all the appropriate badges, medals, and accoutrement.
playbook_item_fine_pair_of_pistols_descr: A matched pair of light handguns, made for greater accuracy. How do they stand out from the average handgun?
playbook_item_fine_personal_weapon_descr: A well-made light weapon. How does it stand out from the average weapon?
playbook_item_fine_punk_stuff_descriptio: An edgy item designed to help you make a scene and get away. A small hoverboard, designed for tricks and adorned with sweet graphics of your choice. A skullcap and boots adorned with pointy bits. A fanny pack full of fancy marbles and four-sided dice. Whatever you choose, it is impressive or infuriating to see in use—especially to poseurs and old folks—improving your effect level when you make a dramatic entrance or escape.
playbook_item_fine_renfield_vial_descrip: A dose of the drug, made from the infected's blood. Its addictive nature will make users into loyal thralls.
playbook_item_fine_scary_weapon/tool_des: A scary-looking hand weapon or tool. A rusty eyeball extractor. A jagged piece of metal. A dirty syringe. A set of shock gloves. This item grants increased effect when you intimidate, not increased harm in combat.
playbook_item_fine_sensing_focus_descrip: An arcane item worn on the head that allows the bonded user to "see" arcane energies in great detail. Also provides some measure of protection against mental effects like possession. Each arcane focus is unique. What does yours look like? What is magical about its appearance?
playbook_item_fine_shadow_cloak_descript: A fine cloak imbued with arcane power designed to blend you into the darkness around you.
playbook_item_fine_spell_focus_descripti: A small arcane talisman that allows the bonded user to wield spells with exceptional control. Each spell focus is a hand-crafted or unworked natural item. What is yours made from?
playbook_item_fine_stealth_outfit_descri: A full bodysuit of smart clothing designed to blend you into the darkness around you.
playbook_item_fine_surveillance_gear_des: A clandestine surveillance kit equipped with an impressive array of signal capture devices and long-range sensors for recording audio and video. The fine quality of this kit may increase the effect of your investigative actions when you use it.
playbook_item_fine_threading_focus_descr: A small emergent item that allows the bonded user to focus their energies when casting emergent spells (threads). Each threading focus is a high-tech item which shouldn't function or appears to malfunction. How is its icon mysterious when you wield it?
playbook_item_gecko_gloves_description: A pair of nanofiber gloves that generate exceptional intermolecular attraction that allow the user to hold items securely and quickly scale smooth or vertical surfaces.
playbook_item_kamikaze_vial_description: A dose of the drug, which boosts strength, pain tolerance, and irrational aggression for the span of several minutes. The GM will modify your position and effect accordingly when you fight on kamikaze. Also, you suffer two consequences: "Can't Tell Friend From Foe" and "Can't Stop Until They're All Broken." You may resist these as usual. Sure there are other combat drugs with less side effects, but "real ass mofos take dat 'kaze!"
playbook_item_light_armor_description: A set of armor that is lighter and less conspicuous than normal. Sets of armor like this are highly restricted in Kingston, but you have (real or forged) security licensing for this set. Standard armor is bulky.
playbook_item_medical_supplies_descripti: A handheld or shoulder-strapped case containing up to three uses of sprays or patches. During downtime, you automatically refill your medical supplies so long as you have reasonable access to a supplier or workshop.
playbook_item_military_weapon_descriptio: A devastating firearm designed for war. Choose its optimal range (near or far), and up to two features for the weapon: cornershot—launcher—light—penetrating—rapid fire—reload assist—shocking—silenced—smartgun—stabby—stopping power—splitting. Describe the weapon and give it a nickname if you wish. Weapons like this are extremely illegal for private citizens in Kingston, but you have real or forged military licensing for this one.
playbook_item_portable_VR_kit_descriptio: A thin suitcase containing secure seating and a lightweight headband that provides the essential hardware for noninvasive virtual reality interface (trodes). Case includes a stylish finish and a lightweight harness. This specialty-made chair collapses into a suitcase form, thus reducing its load to 1 even though it takes both hands to move it once its unfolded. Unfolds to the size of a small closet and includes a stealth fabric enclosure (concealed from observers at a distance from all angles). If you bring the trodes only, it takes up no load instead.
playbook_item_privacy_generator_descript: A small tabletop device that allows the user to have a short face-to-face conversation free of audio surveillance and remote listening.
playbook_item_red_rock_description: A dose of the popular drug, which induces a dreamlike state. The victim of this crystal is not fully unconscious, but rather retreats into a calm, suggestible mental state, similar to hypnotism.
playbook_item_special_ammo_description: A bandolier of specially crafted ammunition for a pistol or small rifle, especially potent against intended targets, but less effective against others.
playbook_item_strange_trinket_descriptio: A small item that grants the bearer visions of the distant past or impending future of a nearby item or location—whether they want them or not. Labored concentration may clarify what is envisioned. What strange phenomena accompanies the use of this seemingly innocuous trinket?
playbook_item_street_drugs_description: A pocketful of up to three uses of illegal drugs. When you employ street drugs, choose one from the list at right. During downtime, you automatically refill your street drugs, so long as you have reasonable access to a supplier or workshop.
playbook_item_stunlock_vial_description: A dose of tranquilizer sufficient to put someone to sleep for an hour. Release in someone's face for a brief but powerful effect. The victim's sleep isn't supernatural, but it is deep—they can be roused with some effort.
playbook_item_suite_of_warez_description: Access to illegal apps which expand a cyberdeck's functionality. Executing multiple warez during a run tends to draw unwanted attention.
playbook_item_utility_harness_descriptio: A strap worn over the shoulder containing a modular pouch and hook system to safely hold up to three chemicals or small gadgets. During downtime, you automatically refill your utility harness, so long as you have reasonable access to a supplier or workshop.
playbook_mage_drawback_description_0: You take +1 heat the first time you use arcane power of any kind on a run. Yes: even Assensing counts as arcane power.
playbook_mage_drawback_description_1: Your access to the secret arts costs you 1 nuyen per downtime to keep active. No: Assensing doesn't count.
playbook_mage_drawback_description_2: Your beliefs or dogma forbid you from commanding spiritual entities. You may spend 1 edge to overcome this stricture.
playbook_mage_drawback_description_3: Each downtime phase, you must spend one downtime activity studying and practicing in a lodge (or else lose 1 edge).
playbook_mage_method_description_0: The manipulation of supernatural energies with practiced routines and science. You may roll to resist supernatural consequences with Intuition. Also take one drawback.
playbook_mage_method_description_1: The guidance of supernatural energies with spiritual reverence and unwavering belief. When you make a deal with spiritual entities, you get +1d. Also take one drawback.
playbook_mage_method_description_2: You gain the benefits of one or both methods above, describing what's unique about your interpretation. Choose an equal number of drawbacks as you do methods.
playbook_mage_method_description_3: You completely deny the benefits and trappings of arcane tradition. To what can you attribute your power: faith, insanity, or some other delusion? Take zero drawbacks.
playbook_mage_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with knowledge or arcane power.
playbook_muscle_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with violence or coercion.
playbook_punk_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with surprise or mayhem.
playbook_rigger_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with technical skill or control.
playbook_shell_description: A brain controlling a cybernetic frame
playbook_shell_xp_condition: You fulfilled your functions despite difficulty or danger
playbook_snake_xp_condition: You addressed a challenge with deception or calculation.
